channel.title: Gad Gad - Blog
channel.description: Ph.D. Student in Computer Science specializing in Wi-Fi Sensing, Federated Learning, and Differential Privacy

item.title: The AI revolution
item.description: The black box nature of AI models is a double-edged sword. On the one hand, it makes the data speak for themselves. On the other hand, it cancels our ability to understand why AI makes its judgments, not just because the models are complex, but because the data are complex. But the data has always existed, and we always needed to make predictions.

item.title: Dear GOD: Delete My Data Now!
item.description: DID YOU GET MY CONSENT? Let me be clear... NO, I DID NOT AND I DO NOT CONSENT TO THIS. DELETE MY DATA AND REMOVE MY SELF FROM THIS SILLY GAME RIGHT NOW... RIGHT NOW... RIGHT NOW...
